pageProps.title: How to Retire Sooner and Live Your Best Life
pageProps.metaDesc: When people hear the word “retirement,” they typically think of working for 40 years and finally transitioning to a life they want at the end of their working life, around age 65. However, waiting until you’re 65 to enjoy your life doesn’t sound too appealing to most people. The good news is that there are four ways to plan for retirement, and one of them may be the key to retiring sooner and living the life you desire.
